EmailTemplate.name: DPS -DuPont™ Donations / Community Outreach
EmailTemplate.subject: DuPont™ Donations / Community Outreach
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.Salutation} {!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName},
Thank you for your interest in Dupont™ MotorSports.
Science of Racing, that's where the science of DuPont comes in. We offer some miraculous products and technologies that are in and on your car. To find out more, visit our Dupont™ MotorSports website. http://www2.dupont.com/Our_Company/en_US/motorsports/science/
DuPont Protection Solutions
